pullRequest.title: Scroll wheel
pullRequest.bodyText:
Corrects the mouse wheel behavior on the board and minimap. When the wheel without CTRL zooms, it will scroll with CTRL and vice versa. When scrolling, holding shift scrolls horizontally. Holding shift while zooming has no effect. The direction of the minimap zoom and the board zoom should now always be the same.
Note that as before, the minimap doesnt care about CTRL and will always zoom.
Resolves #2405
Resolves #2399

commit.message: Issues 2405 and 2399, mouse wheel behavior correction

nodes.bodyText: While in testing this does what it says it does, the use of XOR could likely use a small comment/table explaining which modes are active with which key presses. Not required, but would be helpful in the future.
